channel.title: Minecraft Clicker v0.301
channel.description:
This game is no longer online and i think that is a shame therefor I am putting my money into getting it back online a rewriting it. The basic functions are already working and you can view them below.
Website: http://www.minecraftclicker.com/
[b]Updates:[/b] Reworked code and added bosses Added 8 new ores Added secure register/login PHP
[b]Upcoming:[/b] Multiplayer woodcutting mob killing level up system skill points crafting
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2w6fgxv.png[/img]

For that reason I’m moving this to the other games board instead of the development board.

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

ilovewebdesign95:

Ok i copied someones website… am i advertising on it no… am i asking for donations no… am i adding to it yes… is it going open source yes… GET THIS THROUGH YOUR HEAD you have done this before. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,598900.msg4210706.html#msg4210706 Year ago. LOL

Once again, that doesn’t matter. There’s very little changes and you’ve said all of this before on an alternate account. Once again, what does RSPS have to do with this? This is a completely different scenario, on a much different scale.

This thread is funny because Ruby has stolen other peoples website templates and tried to take credit for it before.

3 years ago, and had made significant changes before releasing it. However, that doesn’t take it away, yes that did happen. Although it’s quite obvious that has changed to this date, quite obviously I’ve changed since then and pulled back some self respect and actually worked on releasing all of my own work and compiling them into tutorials for others.

item.title: Minecraft Clicker v0.301
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

ilovewebdesign95:

So copying his website isnt the same as copying runescapes server and client… which is how this community started are you fudgeing retarded? Lol you got a badge so what… you guys still constantly rip shit from other people whats the differnce and yah im playing that card because there is no fudgeing differnce mate. Copying is Copying.

Using documents isn’t “ripping shit from other people”. This website wasn’t originally founded on runescapes server and client, it was a runescape hacking community which had a splinter off into this site. I do not “copy” anyone, I’m nothing to do with runescape or runescape private servers. I’m a website developer.

Stop stealing other peoples work and passing it off as your own you fucking embarrassment.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Clicker v0.301
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

ilovewebdesign95:

I am making this open source and im not putting ads or donation on it, but im not going to argue with people here because they are being hypocrites . Ok i took someone elses work… what have the private server community been doing all these years?

Do you see a Java badge beside my name? Or anything related to the RSPS community beside it other than my ex staff award? No. I don’t deal with RSPS, I deal with websites. You have no two feet to stand on against most of the members in this board, so don’t try and play that card.

You take other peoples work and try to pass it off on your own, you’ve done it so many times that you made a new account and got caught again. Fix your life out mate.

Read full topic
